May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. params.sender_: The address sending WETH to be staked
params.tokenAmount_: The amount of WETH to stake
params.token_: The address of the token WETH

returns.liquidTkn: The address of ETHx token received

returns._0: address The address of the Stader Stake Pools Manager

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.ethxAddress_: The address of the ETHx contract
params.protocolAddress_: The address of the Stader Stake Manager contract
params.wethAddress_: The address of the WETH contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setETHxAddress(address).details: Only callable by the admin role

params.ethxAddress_: The new address of the ETHx contract

params.slippage_: Slippage value represented in wei (1e17 means 10% slippage allowance)

setprotocolAddress(address).details: Only callable by the admin role

params.protocolAddress_: The new address of the Stader Stake Pools Manager

VAULT_STRATEGY_ROLE().notice: VAULT STRATEGY ROLE to manage configuration and execution

claimEarnings(address,address).notice: Function placeholders for potential future implementation

deposit(address,address,address,uint256,.notice: Takes WETH from Vault, converts it to ETH, and stakes it to receive ETHx

getProtocol().notice: Retrieves the address of the Stader Stake Pools Manager used by this adapter

getSlippage().notice: Retrieves the currently configured slippage value

getTokenPrice(address).notice: Function placeholders for potential future implementation

initialize(address,address,address).notice: Initializes the adapter with the necessary addresses and roles

protocolAddress().notice: Address of the Stader Stake Manager contract

setETHxAddress(address).notice: Updates the address of the ETHx contract

setSlippage(uint256).notice: Sets new slippage allowance value for scaling operations

setprotocolAddress(address).notice: Updates the address of the Stader Stake Pools Manager contract

withdraw(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Function placeholders for potential future implementation
